card.name:
Super Saiyan God SS Goku & 
Super Saiyan God SS Vegeta
card.title: Divine Warriors with Infinite Power
card.leader_skill:
"Power Beyond Super Saiyan" or 
"Movie Heroes" Category Ki +3 and 
HP, ATK & DEF +170%, plus an additional 
HP, ATK & DEF +30% for characters who 
also belong to the "Kamehameha" Category
card.passive_skill_desc:
ATK & DEF +177%; plus an additional Ki +2 
per Type Ki Sphere obtained; chance of performing 
a critical hit and chance of evading enemy's attack 
(including Super Attack) +7% per Rainbow Ki Sphere 
obtained; attacks effective against all Types 
when Ki is 16 or more; launches an additional 
Super Attack when Ki is 20 or more; medium chance 
of performing a critical hit; medium chance of 
evading enemy's attack (including Super Attack)
card.active_skill_effect:
Causes ultimate damage to enemy and, 
within the turn activated, 
all attacks become critical hits
card.active_skill_condition:
Can be activated when HP is 50% or less, 
or when facing only 1 enemy, 
whose HP is 50% or less (once only)
card.passive_skill_itemized_desc:
*Basic effect(s)*
- ATK & DEF 177%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Receives an additional Ki +2 per Type Ki Sphere obtained
- Medium chance of performing a critical hit
- Medium chance of evading enemy's attack
*For every Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained*
- Chance of performing a critical hit 7%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Chance of evading enemy's attack 7%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When attacking with 16 or more Ki*
- Attacks are effective against all Types
*When attacking with 20 or more Ki*
- Launches an additional Super Attack

specials.name: Divine Fang of Azure Light
specials.description:
Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn 
and causes colossal damage to enemy
specials.special_bonus_1: Super Attack +30% – Super Attack power will be increased even more!

specials.name: Kamehameha & Galick Gun
specials.special_bonus_1: Super Attack +30% – Super Attack power will be increased even more!

specials.name: Divine Fang of Azure Light (Extreme)
specials.description:
Massively raises ATK and 
greatly raises DEF for 1 turn and 
causes colossal damage to enemy
specials.special_bonus_1: Super Attack +30% – Super Attack power will be increased even more!

specials.name: Kamehameha & Galick Gun (Extreme)
specials.special_bonus_1: Super Attack +30% – Super Attack power will be increased even more!

next_card.description:
Can be activated starting from the 4th turn

optimal_awakening_growths.passive_skill_description:
*基本効果*
・{一度だけ}1ターンの間、ダメージ軽減率77%{↑}
・ATK/DEF300%{↑}
・気玉取得時の気力上昇量+2
・全属性に効果抜群で攻撃
・全ての攻撃をガード
・高確率で会心が発動
・中確率で敵の攻撃を回避
・気玉変化：知→虹
*登場から4ターンの間*
・ランダム気玉変化：知を除く属性気玉1種→虹
*取得気玉1個につき*
・ATK/DEF10%{↑}(最大100%)
*取得虹気玉1個につき*
・会心率/回避率10%{↑}
*取得気玉7個以上*
・必殺技が追加発動
*気力メーター20以上で攻撃時*
・必殺技が追加発動
*アクティブスキル発動時
または気力メーター24で攻撃時*
・ATK50%{↑}
*攻撃時*
・{一度だけ}敵のHP50%以上の場合、
　必ず会心が発動し、必殺技が追加発動
*攻撃を受けるとき*
・{一度だけ}自身のHP50%以下の場合、
　敵の攻撃を回避
optimal_awakening_growths.leader_skill_description:
"Power Beyond Super Saiyan" or 
"Movie Heroes" Category Ki +3 and 
HP, ATK & DEF +170%, plus an additional 
Ki +1 and HP, ATK & DEF +30% 
for characters who also belong to 
the "Kamehameha" Category

next_card.name:
Super Saiyan God Goku & 
Super Saiyan God Vegeta

Super Saiyan God SS Goku & 
Super Saiyan God SS Vegeta
next_card.description:
Can be activated starting from the 4th turn 
from the start of battle (once only)

optimal_awakening_growths.passive_skill_itemized_desc:
*Basic effect(s)*
- {passiveImg:once}Damage reduction rate 77%{passiveImg:up_g} for 1 turn
- ATK & DEF 300%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Receives an additional Ki +2 per Ki Sphere obtained
- Attacks are effective against all Types
- Guards all attacks
- High chance of performing a critical hit
- Medium chance of evading enemy's attack
- Changes Ki Spheres: INT to Rainbow
*For 4 turns from the character's entry turn*
- Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (INT
excluded) to Rainbow Ki Spheres
*For every Ki Sphere obtained*
- ATK & DEF 10%{passiveImg:up_g} (up to 100%)
*For every Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained*
- Chance of performing a critical hit & chance of evading 
enemy's attack 10%{passiveImg:up_g}
*7 or more Ki Spheres obtained*
- Launches an additional Super Attack
*When attacking with 20 or more Ki*
- Launches an additional Super Attack
*When activating the Active Skill or when attacking with 24 Ki*
- ATK 50%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When attacking*
- {passiveImg:once}Performs a critical hit and launches an additional 
Super Attack when the enemy's HP is 50% or more
*When receiving an attack*
- {passiveImg:once}Evades enemy's attack when HP is 50% or less
